ComicInfo.Title: The Past Is a Bucket of Ashes
ComicInfo.Summary: The Past Is a Bucket of Ashes: Thor loses the Don Blake identity and gains secret identity of Sigurd Jarlson courtesy of Nick Fury. Sigurd gets a job as a construction worker but the site is wrecked by Fafnir looking for the god of thunder.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:39:42. [Issue ID 38463]
ComicInfo.Characters: Odin (guest),Karnilla (villain),Volstagg (guest),Balder (guest),Dum Dum Dugan (guest),Nick Fury (guest),Lorelei (villain),Surtur (villain),Loki (villain),Heimdall (cameo),Thor (feature),Haag (villain),Fafnir (villain),Clark Kent [Superman] (cameo),Guido Sapristi (guest, introduction),Lois Lane (cameo)
